mapper.insert: insert into job_tasks_table( job_task_id, source_table_id, source_table_name, target_table_id, target_table_name ) values ( #{jobTaskId}, #{sourceTableId}, #{sourceTableName}, #{targetTableId}, #{targetTableName} )
mapper.update: update job_tasks_table set job_task_id = #{jobTasksTable.jobTaskId}, source_table_id = #{jobTasksTable.sourceTableId}, source_table_name = #{jobTasksTable.sourceTableName}, target_table_id = #{jobTasksTable.targetTableId}, target_table_name = #{jobTasksTable.targetTableName} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, job_task_id AS jobTaskId, source_table_id AS sourceTableId, source_table_name AS sourceTableName, target_table_id AS targetTableId, target_table_name AS targetTableName from job_tasks_table where id = #{id}

select id, job_task_id AS jobTaskId, source_table_id AS sourceTableId, source_table_name AS sourceTableName, target_table_id AS targetTableId, target_table_name AS targetTableName from job_tasks_table where 1=1 limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into job_tasks_table
job_task_id,
source_table_id,
source_table_name,
target_table_id,
target_table_name,
#{jobTaskId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{sourceTableId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{sourceTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{targetTableId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{targetTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update job_tasks_table
job_task_id = #{jobTasksTable.jobTaskId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
source_table_id = #{jobTasksTable.sourceTableId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
source_table_name = #{jobTasksTable.sourceTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target_table_id = #{jobTasksTable.targetTableId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
target_table_name = #{jobTasksTable.targetTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
